con:part.con:content: <wsdl:definitions name="ExternalSalesManagerService" targetNamespace="http://informatique.polytech.unice.fr/soa1/salesmanagement/" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:wsdl="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/" xmlns:tns="http://informatique.polytech.unice.fr/soa1/salesmanagement/" xmlns:soap="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/soap/" xmlns:ns2="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/http" xmlns:ns1="http://salesmanagement.soa1.polytech.unice.fr/"> <wsdl:import location="http://localhost:8181/cxf/SalesManagement?wsdl=SalesManagement.wsdl" namespace="http://salesmanagement.soa1.polytech.unice.fr/"></wsdl:import> <wsdl:binding name="ExternalSalesManagerServiceSoapBinding" type="ns1:SalesManagement"> <soap:binding style="document" transport="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/http"/> <wsdl:operation name="fetchCatalog"> <soap:operation soapAction="" style="document"/> <wsdl:input name="fetchCatalog"> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:input> <wsdl:output name="fetchCatalogResponse"> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:output> </wsdl:operation> <wsdl:operation name="fetchItemInfo"> <soap:operation soapAction="" style="document"/> <wsdl:input name="fetchItemInfo"> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:input> <wsdl:output name="fetchItemInfoResponse"> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:output> </wsdl:operation> </wsdl:binding> <wsdl:service name="ExternalSalesManagerService"> <wsdl:port binding="tns:ExternalSalesManagerServiceSoapBinding" name="ExternalSalesManagertPort"> <soap:address location="http://localhost:8181/cxf/SalesManagement"/> </wsdl:port> </wsdl:service> </wsdl:definitions>

<wsdl:definitions name="SalesManagement" targetNamespace="http://salesmanagement.soa1.polytech.unice.fr/" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:wsdl="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/" xmlns:ns1="http://salesmanagement.soa1.polytech.unice.fr/"> <wsdl:types> <xs:schema elementFormDefault="unqualified" targetNamespace="http://salesmanagement.soa1.polytech.unice.fr/" version="1.0" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:tns="http://salesmanagement.soa1.polytech.unice.fr/"> <xs:element name="fetchCatalog" type="tns:fetchCatalog"/> <xs:element name="fetchCatalogResponse" type="tns:fetchCatalogResponse"/> <xs:element name="fetchItemInfo" type="tns:fetchItemInfo"/> <xs:element name="fetchItemInfoResponse" type="tns:fetchItemInfoResponse"/> <xs:complexType name="fetchItemInfo"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="product_id" type="xs:int"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="fetchItemInfoResponse"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="detailed_product" type="tns:detailedProduct"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="detailedProduct"> <xs:complexContent> <xs:extension base="tns:product"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="collection" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="description" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="image_link" type="xs:string"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:extension> </xs:complexContent> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="product"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="id" type="xs:int"/> <xs:element name="name" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="price" type="xs:double"/> <xs:element name="product_type" type="tns:productType"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="fetchCatalog"> <xs:sequence/> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="fetchCatalogResponse"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="catalog" type="tns:catalog"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="catalog"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element maxOccurs="unbounded" name="products" type="tns:product"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:simpleType name="productType"> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:enumeration value="CHAIR"/> <xs:enumeration value="TABLE"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:schema> </wsdl:types> <wsdl:message name="fetchCatalogResponse"> <wsdl:part element="ns1:fetchCatalogResponse" name="parameters"></wsdl:part> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="fetchItemInfo"> <wsdl:part element="ns1:fetchItemInfo" name="parameters"></wsdl:part> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="fetchCatalog"> <wsdl:part element="ns1:fetchCatalog" name="parameters"></wsdl:part> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="fetchItemInfoResponse"> <wsdl:part element="ns1:fetchItemInfoResponse" name="parameters"></wsdl:part> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:portType name="SalesManagement"> <wsdl:operation name="fetchItemInfo"> <wsdl:input message="ns1:fetchItemInfo" name="fetchItemInfo"></wsdl:input> <wsdl:output message="ns1:fetchItemInfoResponse" name="fetchItemInfoResponse"></wsdl:output> </wsdl:operation> <wsdl:operation name="fetchCatalog"> <wsdl:input message="ns1:fetchCatalog" name="fetchCatalog"></wsdl:input> <wsdl:output message="ns1:fetchCatalogResponse" name="fetchCatalogResponse"></wsdl:output> </wsdl:operation> </wsdl:portType> </wsdl:definitions>
